revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|brand = Wandboard |model = Quad |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (WB-IMX6Q-BW) |revision = rev C1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6Q;MCIMX6Q5EYM10AC; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63AFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8031;AR8031-AL1A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SATA, Micro SD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console,, DE-9,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 8-pin header,, unpopulated

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = June 2013 |estprice = 129 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = USI WM-BN-BM-04 |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4329; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The [[Wandboard]] i.MX6 is a ultra low power complete computer with high performance multimedia capabilities based around the [[NXP]] i.MX6 [[ARM]] (Cortex-A9) processor.
===Specification=== *CPU: [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX6 Quad @1GHz :MCIMX6Q5EYM10AC • [[ARM]] (Cortex-A7) :GPU: ''Vivante'' GC2000 + GC355 + GC320 *Memory: 2GB SDRAM (DDR3L) *Onboard Storage: SD, SATA *Wi-Fi: 802.11abgn/ac 1T1R *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: DC 5V/3A
==See also== :;[[Wandboard]] • [https://www.wandboard.org/products/ Products] • [[List of SBCs]] :Wandboard - Solo, Dual, Quad (2013) *[[Wandboard Solo]] (i.MX6S) (WB-IMX6S-BW) *[[Wandboard Dual]] (i.MX6U) (WB-IMX6U-BW) *[[Wandboard Quad]] (i.MX6Q) (WB-IMX6Q-BW) *[[Wandboard Quad Plus]] (i.MX6Q) (WB-IMX6QP-BW) *[[Wandboard Quad QCA9377]] (i.MX6Q) (WB-IMX6Q-9377) *[[Wandboard QCA9377]] (i.MX6) (WB-IMX6-9377) :w/ Certified Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 5.0
*[[Wandboard Pi 6U]] (i.MX6UL) ([[PICO-IMX6UL-KIT]]) *[[Wandboard Pi 7D]] (i.MX7D) ([[PICO-PI-IMX7]])
:WandPi 8M - Lite, Pro, Deluxe (2018/04) *[[Wandboard Pi 8M Pro]] (i.MX8M) :• CPU: [[NXP]] i.MX8M Quad @1.5GHz :. [[ARM]] (Cortex-A53) :• GPU: ''Vivante'' GC7000 Lite :• Memory: 2GB RAM (LPDDR4) :• Storage: 4GB eMMC *[[Wandboard Pi 8M Plus]] (IMX8M-PLUS-2G/4G) :• CPU: [[NXP]] i.MX8M Plus @1.8GHz :. [[ARM]] (Cortex-A53 + M7) :• GPU: ''Vivante'' GC520L (2D) :• Memory: 2GB/4GB RAM (LPDDR4) :• Storage: 32GB eMMC
